title: Our Addictive Carnal Games
alternative_title: Erotic Maniac Play; Erotomaniac Play; Our Addictive Carnal Games; エロトマニアックプレイ; 超瘋狂年下攻戀愛遊戲
status: Erotic Maniac Play; Erotomaniac Play; Our Addictive Carnal Games; エロトマニアックプレイ; 超瘋狂年下攻戀愛遊戲
description:
Description :
        .Haruki is a school nurse by day, natural-born manhunter by night. Lately, though, he hasn't been able to catch any prey. As his frustration reaches a boiling point, he is approached by a mysterious young man named Shion. "Give it up. I'm only gonna stop you." Haruki laughs this off, believing it to be some kind of immature revenge plot. Shion seizes this opportunity to push Haruki down and bind his hands. In a state of rapture, Shion says, "I've been told I'm pretty good. So, all you gotta do is sit back and take it." Despite not usually being on the receiving end, Haruki can't help but lose himself to the pleasure...! Sequel to Sensei no Iukoto Kikinasai!
